column3: but he requires that it be paired with mini chocolate chips
column4: so I threw some of those in between the layers. I also had a few Peppermint Jo Jos on hand so I crushed them up and threw some of those in along with some crushed meringue cookies because
column5: why not? It’s a total smorgasbord of minty chocolate chippy cookie crunchy goodness. I didn’t measure how much of each topping I used
column6: but after I tasted the finished product
column7: I wish I had added more. You can add anything you want- crushed candy canes
column9: etc. And don’t be afraid to use a heavy hand. Texture = good.
